styles.name: Cyberpunk Future
styles.prompt: Cinematic vertical portrait. A person wearing high-tech gear in a neon-lit, futuristic Cyberpunk metropolis. Rain-soaked streets, holographic advertisements. Dynamic, bustling moment, highly detailed.

styles.name: Galactic Explorer
styles.prompt: Cinematic vertical portrait. Inside a spaceship cockpit or on an unknown planet, a person wearing a futuristic explorer suit. Stars and nebulae visible outside. Spaceship captain pose, adventurous atmosphere.

styles.name: Ottoman Era

styles.name: Wild West

styles.name: Renaissance Period

styles.name: Viking Age

styles.name: Feudal Japan (Samurai)
styles.prompt: Cinematic vertical portrait. In Feudal Japan (Bamboo forest, temple, or dojo), a person wearing samurai armor or traditional robes. Sharp, focused lighting. Meditative or ready for battle.

styles.name: Roman Empire

styles.name: Ancient Egypt

styles.name: Age of Pirates

styles.name: 1920s Art Deco

styles.name: Stone Age
